main event: A silvery bubble was observed moving smoothly upward and then downward, changing color and size during the sighting.
interesting points: The object was seen at a distance of 75 to 100 yards,The ball turned red for a moment before changing size,The sighting lasted for approximately 1-15 seconds, The document is part of old Project Blue Book UFO reports, The sighting occurred in Miami, Florida.
witness description: an adult and a young daughter
